alert.note: Alert for Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 04 at 4:03AM MST until December 05 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow, moderate at times this afternoon and tonight. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches. * WHERE...Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains. * WHEN...From 11 AM Today to 11 AM MST Monday. The heaviest snow is expected this afternoon through late this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening and morning commutes. This includes Togwotee and Teton Passes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
